content.preview_text: {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} Your order has been delayed. See more details about it in this email. {{else is attributes.order_type 'OTCHS'}} Hang tight, we're working hard to get it to you. {{else is attributes.order_type 'SDD'}}Hang tight, we're working hard to get it to you {{else is attributes.order_type 'SDD-Mixed'}}Hang tight, we're working hard to get it to you {{else}} Delivery date {{decoratedDateLocale current_shipment.guaranteed_delivery_date translations}} for this shipment. Track your shipment here to see where it is at any time. Weâ€™ll email you when it gets delivered. {{/is}}

custom.legal:
{{{{raw}}}}
{{#is attributes.order_type 'OTCHS'}} The fastest and easiest way to place an order is online. To find your plan, visit: {{{attributes.web_url}}}.

You received this email to confirm the action noted above. You can view the OTC Health Solutions privacy in the footer of your plan's webpage. For any additional questions about your OTC Health Solutions order, contact us at: {{{attributes.phone_number}}}.

{{else}} You received this email to confirm the action noted above. Your email address will not be saved or used for any other purpose unless you chose to sign up for special email offers when you registered. You can change your email preference in My Account at any time. We value your privacy and the security of personal information and never give or sell any specific information about you to any manufacturer or direct marketers. If you have questions or concerns about how we protect your privacy, read our Privacy Policy. {{#is attributes.order_type 'SDD'}}

Same day delivery details
Same day delivery is available in as little as 3 hours for retail orders with an eligible address. Same day qualified orders must be placed at least 4 hours before 8 pm or store closing time, whichever is earlier. Select stores may have extended hours (including 24 hour delivery). Some deliveries may not be eligible for Same Day Delivery due to delivery address, holidays, weather or other delivery constraints. Customers are not required to be present for deliveries. Delivery window is only an estimate and may be subject to delays. Delivery is not available in all locations, including Puerto Rico and Hawaii.

Same day delivery payment details
Online and in-store pricing may vary. Some items may not be available for delivery. Coupons, ExtraBucksÂ® Rewards, and certain in-store and online promotions may not be applicable to delivery orders, and are subject to CVS PharmacyÂ® coupon policy. FSA/HSA cards may not be used for delivery fees. Payment must be made at time of order. Refunds will be issued to the original form of payment. Same-day delivery shipping fees are non-refundable for customer cancelled orders. Deliveries must either be entirely accepted or rejected. No partial order acceptance is permitted. Call your local CVS pharmacy for additional details. {{else is attributes.order_type 'SDD-Mixed'}}

Same day delivery details
Same day delivery is available in as little as 3 hours for retail orders with an eligible address. Same day qualified orders must be placed at least 4 hours before 8 pm or store closing time, whichever is earlier. Select stores may have extended hours (including 24 hour delivery). Some deliveries may not be eligible for Same Day Delivery due to delivery address, holidays, weather or other delivery constraints. Customers are not required to be present for deliveries. Delivery window is only an estimate and may be subject to delays. Delivery is not available in all locations, including Puerto Rico and Hawaii.

Same day delivery payment details
Online and in-store pricing may vary. Some items may not be available for delivery. Coupons, ExtraBucksÂ® Rewards, and certain in-store and online promotions may not be applicable to delivery orders, and are subject to CVS PharmacyÂ® coupon policy. FSA/HSA cards may not be used for delivery fees. Payment must be made at time of order. Refunds will be issued to the original form of payment. Same-day delivery shipping fees are non-refundable for customer cancelled orders. Deliveries must either be entirely accepted or rejected. No partial order acceptance is permitted. Call your local CVS pharmacy for additional details. {{else}} {{#unless (itemFlagFinder current_shipment.order_items 'is_pharm' 'true')}} {{#isnt attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}}

*All item-level coupons, offers and discounts are included in the item price. ExtraBucks RewardsÂ®, CarePassâ„¢ rewards and order-level discounts are prorated across all items in your order when it ships.

**It may take up to two days for ExtraBucksÂ® Rewards to become available in the Deals and Rewards section after your qualifying purchase ships. Progress shown under {{#if (itemFlagFinder current_shipment.order_items 'is_pharm' 'true')}} Order Status and History {{else}} Order Status and History {{/if}} is an estimate and actual earning progress may vary.

You can check the status of your order in the {{#if (itemFlagFinder current_shipment.order_items 'is_pharm' 'true')}} Order Status and History {{else}} Order Status and History {{/if}} section of your account. {{/isnt}} {{/unless}} {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}}

You can check the status of your order in the Order Status and History section of your account.

{{/is}} We will email you when your order has shipped, and the email will contain a tracking link so you can check the progress of your delivery. We will only charge you for items when they ship. {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} We will only charge you for items when they ship. {{/is}} If you have any questions about your shipment, please email customercare@cvs.com or call 1-888-607-4287. {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} Please note that at-home COVID-19 tests are nonrefundable. {{/is}} {{/is}}

{{/is}} Â©Copyright CVS.com One CVS Drive, Woonsocket, RI 02895
{{{{/raw}}}}
